nodes.text: Star Wars Kids 4 is the fourth issue of Star Wars Kids magazine. It was published by Scholastic and released in December 1997. Issue 4 included part four of the serial comic The Rebel Thief, written by Ryder Windham.

Star Wars Kids 4 was available exclusively to subscribers of Scholastic's Star Wars Missions young-reader series and roleplaying game, which arrived as monthly continuity packages via direct mail. Each package included a new Star Wars Kids magazine issue and the latest Star Wars Missions adventure book. Star Wars Kids 4 came packaged with the game's fourth adventure book, Destroy the Liquidator.
